title: Old Woman on an Ox
marks:
Signature, Inscription, Mark, Seals, and Sticker
 top center: [ ????????]
description: very skinny old woman with no teeth, a beaklike nose, beady eyes, and bun piled high on head sits side-saddle on a rug draped over an ox; woman holds a flutelike instrument in PL hand, faces viewer; inscription URQ
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
